content: AND #9. Wanting to belong to a club, group, religion or organization that turns you into a mere member or worse, a number—basically a nobody, should not be a desired goal in life. A famous quote by Graucho Marx at the Friars’s Club of Beverly Hill comes to mind, “I Don’t Want to Belong to Any Club That Will Accept Me as a Member.” In that statement lies the truth, choose to be one-of-a-kind. Choose to not belong. Choose to lead and leave a legacy.
